room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: The Clock Tower and Submarine rooms are among the most original I've seen (amongst the 100+ rooms I've played in various countries), providing strong narrative-driven experiences with lots of fun surprises. Definite must-plays if you're an escape room enthusiast.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: The Clock Tower room had great clues. Not easy - we came so close but didn't end up escaping. Staff was very nice to work with.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: This escape room was outstanding - we did the clock tower it was challenging but fun and the clue master did an amazing job keeping the game moving with hints.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: I tried the Home and the Clock tower at the Midtown location of Escape the Room. Both were great, but the Clock tower blew me away! Very interactive and engaging.. cool technological effects.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: Excellent escape game. Can have up to 10 players by request, just pay for extra players at the door. A relatively new game so some minor kinks were being worked out but didn't detract from our enjoyment. Very entertaining. All puzzles were clever and well designed.
